Where Blockchain
meets real Gameplay

Dragonereum is a cryptocollectible player vs player game where users collect and breed unique dragons. Moreover dragons can battle each other.

Whitepaper Get a dragon

What is Dragonereum?

Dragonereum is a criptocollectible decentralized game where users can own and trade dragons, interbreed them and fight other dragons collecting rewards and achievements along the way. All these are done on the blockchain in an open, trusted and decentralized manner.

Read our whitepaper

Interbreedable dragon races

There are 11 interbreedable dragon races with its own strengths and weaknesses. Everything is stored and computed on blockchain. No secrets from you.

On-chain fights

Our dragons can fight. And you can train your dragons and decide on fight strategy. All fights are on-chain so you can verify and check every detail of the fight.

Unique user experience

In-game currency and a system of rewards and achievements creates personal experience for every user. The game is not about collecting. It is about playing.

Built for community

Our aim is to build first truly decentralized digital scarcity game where developers control as little as possible and the community has the ability to verify all the transactions and actions without a necessity to rely on any trusted third party.

Learn More

Stay in touch

Be the first to get a dragon. Sign up for announcements.
